title: Lie or Die Part 1
description:
Murder, another murder, and a hand on a shoulder. How these three things intersect and how the tangled web was unwoven hits at the heart of our justice system. Part 1 of 2.

For episode information and photos, please visit https://anatomyofmurder.com/
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
